name.ja: 魔法クリーチャー召喚

description.en: Epic magical summoning ritual that brings mythical creatures to life with spectacular effects
description.zh: 史诗般的魔法召唤仪式，通过壮观的效果让神话生物栩栩如生
description.ja: 壮大な効果で神話の生き物を蘇らせる叙事詩的な魔法の召喚儀式
description.ko: 장대한 효과로 신화 생물을 생생하게 소환하는 서사적 마법 의식
description.es: Ritual de invocación mágica épica que da vida a criaturas míticas con efectos espectaculares
description.de: Episches magisches Beschwörungsritual, das mythische Kreaturen mit spektakulären Effekten zum Leben erweckt
description.fr: Rituel d'invocation magique épique qui donne vie à des créatures mythiques avec des effets spectaculaires
description.ar: طقوس استدعاء سحرية ملحمية تحيي المخلوقات الأسطورية بتأثيرات مذهلة

metadata.visual_description: An ancient book bursts into flames, from which a fiery phoenix rises, scattering glowing embers into the library.
metadata.camera_movement: macro close-up → orbit fiery wings → wide reveal with glowing silhouette
metadata.lighting_description: dark library glow with fiery orange and red highlights
metadata.environment_setting: dim library table, flames consuming the book edges
metadata.opening_action: Close-up glide across yellowed pages. Illustration of a firebird begins to glow faintly.
metadata.transformation_action: Pages ignite, bursting into flames as phoenix rises in glowing embers.
metadata.finale_action: Phoenix spreads wings wide, scattering sparks that illuminate the dark library.
metadata.final_freeze: final freeze frame of phoenix mid-flight, embers forming glowing text

metadata.visual_description: A book page turns to reveal a desert sketch that erupts into swirling sand, from which a massive dragon emerges.
metadata.camera_movement: macro page turn → orbit sandstorm → wide dragon reveal
metadata.lighting_description: harsh desert glow with golden storm particles
metadata.environment_setting: library table blending into desert diorama
metadata.opening_action: Extreme close-up of a book page being turned, revealing a desert sketch. Sand trickles off the ink lines.
metadata.transformation_action: Sand erupts from the page, swirling into dunes. A colossal dragon bursts from the storm.
metadata.transformation_camera: dynamic orbit around dragon's head and wings
metadata.finale_action: Wide reveal: dragon towers over the swirling desert contained in the book.
metadata.final_freeze: dragon's roar shakes golden sand into runic text
metadata.text_style: ancient glowing script formed by sand

metadata.visual_description: A hand slowly turns yellowed book pages in moonlight, revealing a human anatomy sketch whose ink lines begin pulsing like veins, the drawing slowly bulging from the page before tearing through the parchment as a savage werewolf claws its way from the 2D illustration into reality.
metadata.camera_movement: macro page turn → close-up on writhing sketch → 360° around transformation → low angle hero shot
metadata.lighting_description: full moon glow streaming through gothic windows with dramatic shadows
metadata.environment_setting: ancient library bathed in moonlight through gothic arched windows
metadata.environment_effects: torn book pages transforming into fur tufts as they scatter, ink stains on table becoming claw marks, moonbeams casting the werewolf's shadow back onto the open book
metadata.opening_action: Fingers slowly turn ancient book pages in moonlight, revealing a detailed human anatomy sketch. As moonbeams touch the page, the ink lines begin subtly pulsing and throbbing like living veins, the flat drawing showing signs of dimensional depth.
metadata.opening_camera: macro tracking finger turning page to anatomy illustration
metadata.opening_audio: page rustling + distant wolf howls + heartbeat beginning
metadata.transformation_action: The anatomical sketch bulges upward from the page, ink lines transforming into actual muscle and bone. Paper stretches and tears as clawed hands punch through, followed by a muzzle breaking the parchment surface. The werewolf claws its way from the 2D drawing into 3D reality, leaving shredded book pages scattered like shed skin.
metadata.transformation_camera: dramatic 360° orbit around morphing creature breaking through pages
metadata.transformation_audio: savage transformation howl + bones cracking + paper tearing
metadata.finale_action: Werewolf stands fully formed, muscles rippling under moonlight, howling triumphantly. Torn book pages flutter around like shed skin in the moonbeams.
metadata.finale_camera: low angle wide shot silhouetted against full moon through window
metadata.finale_audio: primal howl echoing + tribal drums crescendo + wind through pages
metadata.final_freeze: silhouette freezes mid-howl, moonbeams carve text from light and shadow
metadata.text_style: claw marks scratching into jagged moonlit letters

metadata.visual_description: Pale fingers elegantly turn book pages to reveal a gothic portrait that begins bleeding crimson ink, the painted figure's hand slowly extending from the page surface before the entire aristocratic vampire steps gracefully from the 2D portrait into reality as bats flutter from surrounding illustrations.
metadata.camera_movement: macro elegant page turn → close-up on bleeding portrait → spiral ascent → dramatic dolly zoom
metadata.lighting_description: flickering candlelight casting dancing shadows with blood-red highlights
metadata.environment_setting: ancient library slowly morphing into gothic castle interior
metadata.environment_effects: portrait frame becoming a dimensional doorway, blood ink pooling on table and hardening into bat silhouettes, torn page fragments transforming into actual bat wings
metadata.opening_action: Pale, elegant fingers turn aged pages to a gothic portrait. The red ink paint begins glistening and flowing like actual blood, dripping from the page edges. The portrait subject's painted eyes slowly blink to life, gaining depth and dimension.
metadata.opening_camera: macro tracking graceful page turn to gothic portrait
metadata.opening_audio: page whisper + distant pipe organ chord + first heartbeat
metadata.transformation_action: The portrait's hand reaches forward, breaking through the page surface. Blood ink flows as the vampire gracefully steps from the flat painting, one foot then the other, emerging from the 2D portrait into 3D reality. Surrounding page illustrations of bats tear free and take flight.
metadata.transformation_camera: spiral ascent following blood mist and emerging bats
metadata.transformation_audio: sinister aristocratic laugh + bat swarm + blood flowing
metadata.finale_action: Vampire stands in full gothic majesty, cape billowing like wings, fangs gleaming. Bats circle in hypnotic patterns as piercing gaze commands the shadows.
metadata.finale_camera: dramatic dolly zoom focusing on hypnotic gaze
metadata.finale_audio: pipe organ crescendo + echoing evil laugh + bat symphony
metadata.final_freeze: cape freezes mid-billow while bats form elegant text pattern in the shadows
metadata.text_style: blood elegantly dripping to form gothic calligraphy

metadata.visual_description: Gentle hands softly turn pristine pages to reveal a delicate unicorn sketch that begins glowing with golden light, the pencil lines becoming three-dimensional as the paper transforms to crystal glass, before the majestic creature steps through the crystalline page surface in a shower of rainbow petals.
metadata.style: ethereal fantasy, prismatic light, magical realism
metadata.camera_movement: macro gentle page turn → close-up on glowing horn → sweeping gallop follow → wide beauty shot
metadata.lighting_description: soft golden glow transforming to rainbow light with crystalline refractions
metadata.environment_setting: serene library gently blooming into enchanted flower meadow
metadata.environment_effects: pages becoming transparent crystal windows into magical realms, crystal fragments forming perfect flowers on the table surface, stardust from the sketch trailing into real sparkles
metadata.ambient_start: peaceful library with distant nature sounds
metadata.ambient_peak: full magical symphony with nature harmony
metadata.opening_action: Gentle hands turn pages with reverence, revealing an intricate unicorn sketch. The pencil lines begin shimmering and lifting slightly from the page surface, gaining dimensional depth as golden light flows through the illustration like liquid starlight.
metadata.opening_camera: macro tracking gentle page turn to detailed unicorn sketch
metadata.opening_audio: soft page whisper + distant wind chimes + first magical sparkles
metadata.transformation_action: The unicorn sketch becomes fully three-dimensional, stepping delicately forward as the page transforms into crystal glass. The crystal surface ripples like water as the unicorn's hooves touch through, emerging gracefully from the 2D drawing into reality while crystalline fragments become rainbow petals.
metadata.transformation_camera: sweeping camera following unicorn's graceful leap from crystalline explosion
metadata.transformation_audio: ethereal magical whinny + harp glissando + crystal chimes
metadata.finale_action: Unicorn rears majestically in full glory, spiral horn creating a perfect rainbow arc overhead. Healing light spreads as flowers bloom throughout the transformed library.
metadata.finale_camera: wide pullback revealing complete magical transformation with rainbow backdrop
metadata.finale_audio: full orchestral swell + crystalline chimes symphony + nature harmony
metadata.final_freeze: horn tip freezes creating brilliant starburst while petals dance in suspended animation
metadata.text_style: rainbow light gracefully forming flowing elegant script

metadata.visual_description: Trembling hands turn to an ancient demonology page featuring occult symbols that begin glowing red-hot, the pentagram ink becoming molten and bubbling up from the page surface before burning through the parchment to create a dimensional portal from which a three-headed hellhound claws its way from the underworld into reality.
metadata.style: infernal horror, intense heat distortion, dark fantasy
metadata.camera_movement: macro nervous page turn → overhead pentagram formation → low angle emergence → wide through heat waves
metadata.lighting_description: dim candlelight suddenly overwhelmed by hellfire glow with molten shadows
metadata.environment_setting: dark occult library with floor cracking into volcanic fissures and lava pools
metadata.environment_effects: pentagram symbols on other pages beginning to glow sympathetically, book binding crackling from infernal heat, molten ink droplets hardening into sulfur crystals on the table
metadata.opening_action: Nervous fingers turn to forbidden pages showing occult pentagram. The ancient ink begins glowing ember-red and bubbling like lava, rising from the page surface while paper edges smoke and curl from supernatural heat building beneath.
metadata.opening_camera: macro tracking hesitant page turn to demonic pentagram illustration
metadata.opening_audio: ominous page rustle + distant hellish howls + fire beginning to crackle
metadata.transformation_action: The molten pentagram ink burns completely through the page, creating a dimensional tear to hell's depths. Clawed paws grip the page edges from below as three massive hellhound heads push through the burning portal, each breathing differently colored flames as they claw their way from 2D symbol into 3D reality.
metadata.transformation_camera: dramatic low angle tracking the creature's terrifying emergence from flames
metadata.transformation_audio: bone-shaking triple roar + hellfire explosion + chains breaking
metadata.finale_action: Hellhound stands fully manifested, three heads breathing fire simultaneously in different directions. Broken chains fall as the ground beneath melts to flowing magma.
metadata.finale_camera: wide shot through intense heat distortion showing complete hellish transformation
metadata.finale_audio: terrifying demonic choir crescendo + triple infernal roar + lava bubbling
metadata.final_freeze: three fire streams converge and freeze into burning runic text suspended in flame
metadata.text_style: molten lava forming ancient burning demonic runes

metadata.visual_description: Scholarly hands carefully turn to an ancient Greek mythology page featuring serpentine decorative borders that begin writhing and rising from the parchment surface, the ink snakes becoming three-dimensional before tearing free and spiraling upward to coalesce into Medusa as she steps from the increasingly stone-like page.
metadata.camera_movement: macro careful page turn → close-up on writhing patterns → weaving through emerging snakes → POV petrification
metadata.lighting_description: warm scholarly lamplight gradually overtaken by eerie green glow with stone reflections
metadata.environment_setting: classical library slowly transforming into ancient Greek temple ruins with marble columns
metadata.environment_effects: snake-shaped holes remaining in the parchment where serpents emerged, creeping stone texture spreading from the book outward, ink stains on table slowly hardening into marble veins
metadata.creature_sound: chilling serpentine chorus with mythological power
metadata.ambient_peak: full serpentine chaos with stone transformation
metadata.opening_action: Careful fingers turn to ancient Greek text adorned with serpentine borders. The decorative snake patterns begin subtly writhing and lifting from the page surface, ink lines gaining depth and dimension as they slowly animate from 2D drawings into living serpents.
metadata.opening_camera: macro tracking studious page turn to ornate Greek manuscript
metadata.opening_audio: scholarly page turn + distant whispers + first soft serpent hiss
metadata.transformation_action: Living snakes fully separate from the page, leaving snake-shaped tears in the parchment as they spiral upward. They intertwine in hypnotic patterns, coalescing to form Medusa's body and crown of serpent hair as she emerges from the stone-transforming book into reality.
metadata.transformation_camera: dynamic weaving through the mass of emerging snakes as they form Medusa
metadata.transformation_audio: building serpent chorus + marble cracking + ancient power awakening
metadata.finale_action: Medusa's terrible eyes flash brilliant green, her gaze turning everything to marble stone. Serpent hair writhes victoriously as petrification spreads through the entire scene.
metadata.finale_camera: POV shot experiencing the petrifying gaze as stone spreads across vision
metadata.finale_audio: dramatic ancient strings + complete stone transformation + triumphant serpent chorus
metadata.final_freeze: petrifying gaze effect freezes frame as marble texture spreads across everything
metadata.text_style: elegant marble texture forming classical Greek letters carved in stone

metadata.visual_description: Reverent hands turn to ancient Chinese scripture pages adorned with dragon totems that begin flowing like liquid ink, the painted dragon slowly lifting from the page surface as golden scales shimmer and clouds rise from parchment, before the majestic celestial dragon steps through the dimensional page into reality.
metadata.style: traditional Chinese ink painting, celestial majesty, mystical realism
metadata.camera_movement: macro reverent page turn → close-up on flowing dragon totem → sweeping follow through clouds → wide celestial reveal
metadata.lighting_description: warm lantern light transforming to divine golden glow with cloud reflections
metadata.environment_setting: classical Chinese library transforming into heavenly palace among clouds
metadata.environment_effects: Chinese characters floating off pages and reforming as golden cloud wisps, dragon-shaped impressions remaining where the totem emerged, ink brushstrokes in the air solidifying into mist
metadata.primary_sfx: mystical wind chimes and celestial harmony
metadata.secondary_sfx: cloud wisps flowing and dragon scales chiming
metadata.creature_sound: divine dragon roar with celestial resonance
metadata.ambient_start: peaceful scholarly quiet with distant temple bells
metadata.ambient_peak: full celestial symphony with heavenly choir
metadata.opening_action: Respectful hands carefully turn ancient Chinese manuscript pages revealing intricate dragon totems. The ink begins flowing like water and gaining depth, dragon scales lifting from the page surface and glimmering with golden light as mystical mist begins rising from the illustrated clouds.
metadata.opening_camera: macro tracking reverent page turn to detailed dragon totem illustration
metadata.opening_audio: gentle page whisper + temple bells + first mystical chimes
metadata.transformation_action: The dragon illustration becomes three-dimensional, flowing gracefully from the page in streams of liquid golden ink. Its serpentine body emerges section by section through the cloudy page surface as the celestial dragon materializes from 2D art into living reality amid swirling mist.
metadata.transformation_camera: sweeping camera following dragon's graceful ascent through swirling clouds
metadata.transformation_audio: divine dragon roar + celestial harmony + flowing water sounds
metadata.finale_action: Majestic celestial dragon soars in full glory through heavenly clouds, scales radiating golden light. Dragon pearl glows with divine power as auspicious mist fills the transformed space.
metadata.finale_camera: wide reveal of dragon soaring through cloud palace with divine lighting
metadata.finale_audio: full Chinese orchestra + celestial choir + divine wind through clouds
metadata.final_freeze: dragon freezes mid-flight with pearl creating golden light text formation
metadata.text_style: golden Chinese calligraphy formed by divine light rays

metadata.visual_description: Delicate fingers gently turn to a fairy tale page with botanical illustrations that begin glowing softly, the pressed flowers lifting from the page surface and transforming into butterfly wings as an ethereal luminous fairy steps gracefully from the dimensional storybook illustration into reality amid swirling stardust.
metadata.style: whimsical fantasy, ethereal glow, enchanted realism
metadata.camera_movement: macro gentle page turn → close-up on glowing flowers → spiral following stardust → wide magical reveal
metadata.lighting_description: soft candlelight becoming radiant moonbeam glow with prismatic sparkles
metadata.environment_setting: cozy cottage library transforming into enchanted moonlit garden
metadata.environment_effects: book pages becoming floating flower petals, stardust trails dancing in air
metadata.primary_sfx: tiny bell chimes and magical sparkles
metadata.secondary_sfx: flower petals rustling and fairy wings fluttering
metadata.creature_sound: melodic fairy laughter like silver bells
metadata.ambient_start: peaceful garden night with cricket songs
metadata.ambient_peak: full magical symphony with nature chorus
metadata.opening_action: Gentle fingers turn storybook pages to botanical illustrations of wildflowers and fairy silhouettes. The pressed flowers begin glowing with inner light and lifting slightly from the page, petals stirring as the fairy illustration gains dimensional depth.
metadata.opening_camera: macro tracking delicate page turn to glowing flower illustrations
metadata.opening_audio: soft page turn + distant cricket songs + first fairy chimes
metadata.transformation_action: The fairy illustration becomes three-dimensional, stepping delicately from the page as flower petals lift and transform into tiny butterfly wings. She emerges completely from the 2D storybook into 3D reality amid spiraling stardust and luminous moonbeam light.
metadata.transformation_camera: graceful spiral following stardust and fairy wings emerging
metadata.transformation_audio: fairy laughter + magical chimes + wings fluttering
metadata.finale_action: Ethereal fairy hovers in full radiant glory, wings sparkling with stardust. She scatters magical flower petals that bloom into new flowers throughout the enchanted space.
metadata.finale_camera: wide reveal showing complete garden transformation with fairy dancing
metadata.finale_audio: full orchestral fairy tale theme + nature symphony + magical bell chorus
metadata.final_freeze: fairy freezes mid-dance while stardust forms flowing text around her
metadata.text_style: stardust and flower petals forming whimsical flowing script

metadata.visual_description: Armored hands turn to medieval heraldry pages displaying a griffin coat of arms that begins glowing with metallic light, the heraldic emblem gaining dimension as golden feathers lift from the parchment surface before a noble griffin steps majestically from the 2D coat of arms into reality amid thunder and lightning.
metadata.style: medieval heraldic, noble majesty, epic fantasy
metadata.camera_movement: macro armored page turn → close-up on glowing heraldry → dynamic flight through storm → wide thunderous reveal
metadata.lighting_description: torchlight intensifying to golden heraldic glow with lightning flashes
metadata.environment_setting: medieval castle library transforming into mountaintop aerie amid storm clouds
metadata.environment_effects: heraldic banners unfurling from pages, lightning crackling across stone walls
metadata.secondary_sfx: metallic wing beats and heraldic trumpets
metadata.creature_sound: majestic griffin screech with royal authority
metadata.ambient_start: quiet castle hall with distant thunder
metadata.ambient_peak: full storm symphony with heraldic fanfare
metadata.opening_action: Gauntleted hands turn thick parchment to heraldic griffin coat of arms. The metallic inks begin gleaming like real gold and silver, rising slightly from the page surface as the heraldic design gains depth and feathers begin stirring with dimensional life.
metadata.opening_camera: macro tracking armored hand turning to detailed heraldry illustration
metadata.opening_audio: heavy parchment turn + distant thunder + first wind gusts
metadata.transformation_action: The heraldic griffin becomes fully three-dimensional, golden feathers separating from the coat of arms and taking flight. The noble griffin steps powerfully from the medieval parchment into reality, breaking free from its 2D heraldic prison amid crackling lightning and metallic gleams.
metadata.transformation_camera: dynamic flight tracking griffin bursting through storm winds
metadata.transformation_audio: majestic griffin screech + thunder crash + metallic wing beats
metadata.finale_action: Griffin perches regally on stone pinnacle, wings spread wide against lightning-filled sky. Royal authority emanates as storm winds bow to its noble presence.
metadata.finale_camera: wide low-angle shot showing griffin's dominance over storm-swept mountain peak
metadata.finale_audio: heraldic trumpet fanfare + rolling thunder + wind through eagle wings
metadata.final_freeze: griffin freezes in royal pose while lightning forms heraldic text pattern
metadata.text_style: golden metallic letters formed by lightning strikes

metadata.visual_description: Sea-weathered hands turn to ancient nautical charts showing 'Here Be Monsters' warnings that begin bleeding ink into the parchment, the sea illustrations becoming three-dimensional whirlpools as massive tentacles push through the page surface before a colossal kraken emerges from the dimensional chart into reality.
metadata.style: nautical horror, deep sea mystery, oceanic terror
metadata.camera_movement: macro weathered page turn → spiral into ink whirlpool → rising through tentacles → wide oceanic emergence
metadata.lighting_description: dim ship lantern light overwhelmed by eerie bioluminescent glow from deep waters
metadata.environment_setting: ship captain's quarters transforming into stormy ocean depths with massive waves
metadata.environment_effects: book pages dissolving into sea foam, ink spreading like oil across water surface
metadata.primary_sfx: massive tentacles slapping water and ship creaking
metadata.secondary_sfx: deep ocean pressure sounds and ink swirling
metadata.creature_sound: otherworldly kraken calls from ocean depths
metadata.ambient_start: quiet ship cabin with distant ocean waves
metadata.ambient_peak: full oceanic storm with abyssal terror
metadata.music_accent: haunting sea shanties and deep orchestral drones
metadata.opening_action: Salt-stained hands turn to ancient sea charts marked with warnings of sea monsters. The ink illustrations begin bleeding and spreading, gaining depth as they form dimensional pools that swirl like actual whirlpools rising from the page surface.
metadata.opening_camera: macro tracking weathered hands turning to monster-marked nautical chart
metadata.opening_audio: chart rustling + distant ocean waves + first ink drops
metadata.transformation_action: The nautical chart's ocean areas become actual water, with massive tentacles pushing through the page surface from below. The colossal kraken emerges section by section from the 2D map into 3D reality, breaking through dimensional barriers in a torrent of ink and foam.
metadata.transformation_camera: dramatic ascent following tentacles breaking through ink-dark waters
metadata.transformation_audio: kraken roar + massive water displacement + tentacles slapping
metadata.finale_action: Colossal kraken fully surfaces in terrifying majesty, tentacles writhing around the transformed ocean space. Bioluminescent patterns pulse along its massive form as it dominates the churning seas.
metadata.finale_camera: wide shot showing kraken's immense scale dominating the stormy ocean
metadata.finale_audio: deep oceanic terror theme + kraken calls + storm winds and massive waves
metadata.final_freeze: kraken freezes with tentacles forming text pattern in bioluminescent ink
metadata.text_style: flowing bioluminescent text formed by kraken ink trails

metadata.visual_description: Reverent hands turn to Native American totem pages showing thunderbird symbols that begin crackling with electricity, the carved totem gaining three-dimensional depth as sacred feathers lift from the page surface before a mighty thunderbird steps through the dimensional totem into reality amid lightning and thunder.
metadata.style: Native American mysticism, electric majesty, storm power
metadata.camera_movement: macro reverent page turn → close-up on crackling totems → ascending through storm clouds → wide thunderous flight
metadata.lighting_description: sacred fire glow building to intense lightning flashes with electric blue highlights
metadata.environment_setting: sacred lodge transforming into vast storm-swept plains under rolling thunder clouds
metadata.environment_effects: totem poles rising from pages, lightning arcing between sacred symbols
metadata.secondary_sfx: massive wings beating and storm winds howling
metadata.creature_sound: powerful thunderbird cry that shakes the earth
metadata.ambient_start: sacred ceremony quiet with distant thunder
metadata.music_accent: Native American drums and eagle bone whistles
metadata.opening_action: Respectful hands turn to sacred pages showing thunderbird totems and symbols. The carved patterns begin sparking with electric energy and rising from the page surface, gaining dimensional depth as feathers stir with charged storm power.
metadata.opening_camera: macro tracking reverent page turn to detailed totem illustrations
metadata.opening_audio: sacred page turn + distant thunder + first electric sparks
metadata.transformation_action: The thunderbird totem becomes fully three-dimensional, electric feathers separating from the sacred design. The mighty thunderbird steps powerfully from the Native American parchment into reality, emerging through dimensional storm clouds within the heart of the tempest.
metadata.transformation_camera: dynamic ascent following thunderbird rising through storm clouds
metadata.transformation_audio: earth-shaking thunderbird cry + lightning strikes + storm building
metadata.finale_action: Thunderbird soars in full storm majesty, wings spanning the sky as lightning arcs between feathers. Thunder rolls across the transformed plains as it commands the very storm itself.
metadata.finale_camera: wide shot showing thunderbird's dominance over vast storm-swept landscape
metadata.finale_audio: powerful storm symphony + thunderbird calls + wind across sacred plains
metadata.final_freeze: thunderbird freezes with wings spread while lightning forms sacred text patterns
metadata.text_style: electric lightning forming sacred Native American symbols

metadata.visual_description: Skeletal hands turn to forbidden necromancy pages that begin crumbling and rotting, the bone diagrams gaining three-dimensional depth as they lift from corrupted parchment before an undead sorcerous lich assembles from the scattered bone illustrations and steps through the decaying page into reality.
metadata.style: dark necromancy, undead horror, death magic
metadata.camera_movement: macro skeletal page turn → close-up on rotting illustrations → rising through decay → wide necromantic reveal
metadata.lighting_description: candlelight dimming to sickly green necromantic glow with shadow tendrils
metadata.environment_setting: ancient crypt library with pages crumbling into bone dust and shadow
metadata.environment_effects: books rotting rapidly, bone fragments assembling from dust, dark magic wisps
metadata.primary_sfx: bones rattling and dark magic crackling
metadata.secondary_sfx: pages crumbling and whispers of the dead
metadata.creature_sound: hollow lich voice echoing with ancient malice
metadata.ambient_peak: full necromantic symphony with wailing souls
metadata.music_accent: haunting pipe organ and spectral choir
metadata.opening_action: Skeletal fingers turn ancient necromancy tome pages showing bone diagrams and death runes. The parchment begins yellowing and cracking as the bone illustrations lift slightly from the page surface, gaining dimensional depth as dark magic seeps through the rotting paper.
metadata.opening_camera: macro tracking skeletal hand turning to bone diagram illustrations
metadata.opening_audio: ancient page crackle + tomb echoes + first whispered incantations
metadata.transformation_action: The bone diagrams become actual skeletal fragments, assembling into three-dimensional form as they lift from the rapidly decaying pages. The lich materializes completely from the 2D necromantic illustrations, stepping through the rotting parchment into reality wreathed in swirling dark magic.
metadata.transformation_camera: ascending through swirling bone fragments and dark magic
metadata.transformation_audio: hollow lich laughter + bones assembling + dark magic surging
metadata.finale_action: Lich stands in full undead majesty, robes billowing with spectral energy. Ghostly flames dance in empty eye sockets as it commands legions of shadow and bone.
metadata.finale_camera: wide shot showing lich's dominion over realm of death and shadow
metadata.finale_audio: necromantic organ symphony + soul wails + dark magic resonance
metadata.final_freeze: lich freezes with staff raised while soul fire forms runic text
metadata.text_style: bone-white necromantic runes formed by soul fire

metadata.element_particles: sakura petals and fox fire orbs
metadata.visual_description: Graceful hands turn to Japanese ukiyo-e woodblock prints showing foxes among cherry blossoms that begin flowing like living ink, the fox silhouette gaining three-dimensional form as cherry petals drift from the page surface before a mystical nine-tailed kitsune steps gracefully from the dimensional woodblock print into reality.
metadata.style: Japanese mysticism, ukiyo-e artistry, spiritual elegance
metadata.camera_movement: macro graceful page turn → close-up on flowing ink fox → dancing through sakura → wide spiritual manifestation
metadata.lighting_description: soft paper lantern glow building to mystical fox fire with cherry blossom light
metadata.environment_setting: traditional Japanese study transforming into sacred shrine grounds with blooming sakura
metadata.environment_effects: woodblock prints coming alive, cherry petals floating like snow, fox fire orbs dancing
metadata.primary_sfx: mystical fox fire crackling and wind chimes
metadata.secondary_sfx: sakura petals rustling and spiritual bells
metadata.creature_sound: ethereal kitsune call with ancient wisdom
metadata.ambient_start: peaceful temple quiet with distant shakuhachi flute
metadata.ambient_peak: full Japanese spiritual symphony with nature harmony
metadata.music_accent: traditional koto, shamisen, and temple bells
metadata.opening_action: Elegant fingers turn silk-bound pages to ukiyo-e fox prints among cherry blossoms. The woodblock ink begins flowing like water and gaining depth, fox silhouettes lifting from the page surface as sakura petals stir with dimensional life.
metadata.opening_camera: macro tracking graceful page turn to flowing ukiyo-e fox illustration
metadata.opening_audio: silk page whisper + distant temple bells + first fox fire crackles
metadata.transformation_action: The fox illustration becomes fully three-dimensional, flowing gracefully from the ukiyo-e print in streams of liquid ink. Nine tails manifest one by one as the kitsune steps completely from the 2D woodblock artwork into 3D reality amid dancing fox fire and swirling sakura petals.
metadata.transformation_camera: elegant spiral following kitsune's graceful manifestation through cherry blossoms
metadata.transformation_audio: ethereal kitsune call + fox fire dancing + sakura wind
metadata.finale_action: Nine-tailed kitsune stands in full mystical grace, tails flowing like silk ribbons. Fox fire orbs orbit around her as cherry blossoms bloom eternally in the transformed sacred space.
metadata.finale_camera: wide shot showing kitsune's spiritual dominion over blooming sakura shrine
metadata.finale_audio: full Japanese orchestral theme + spiritual bells + wind through cherry blossoms
metadata.final_freeze: kitsune freezes in elegant pose while fox fire forms flowing Japanese calligraphy
metadata.text_style: elegant Japanese characters formed by fox fire and floating sakura petals

label.ja: エンディングテキスト
